import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' export default function StoreProduct() { const idProduct = useParams().product const [productDetail, setProductDetail] = useState() useEffect(() => { const resDb = async () =>{ const detail = await axios.get(`http://localhost:3001/product/all/${idProduct}`) setProductDetail(detail.data) } resDb() }, []) return ( <> { productDetail === undefined?():( //
